name: MoonOre
description:
Join a 2D multiplayer mining RPG, play as a miner on the moon and gather ores while building your miners colony. The moon is scattered with ore and collectible resources!

MoonOre absolutely free with no over powered stats or paid bonouses everyone should be equal!

While there is not a huge selection of weapons because the primary focus is mining, you can still battle other players and fight over ore nodes for your colony. You can craft basic battle weapons to use in order to defend or attack other players, yes, it's in real time and everyone plays a character during the battle.

Any item that you find in the game can be crafted using moonores unique crafting system. All weapons and other items are based on the type of ore that you choose to use, moon, gold, silver, copper these are your options, moon is the strongest option and does have a strong advantage over other types of ores. Keep in mind Moon Ore is a little bit harder to find and using it to craft.. well you do require quite a bit of it.

View details »
